title: Visma-Lease a Bike Vows to Repay Monument Debt after Worst Return of Entire WorldTour in 2024
content:
Wish-list of 'super team' expands beyond Tour de France after it failed to hit a top-10 in all five monuments: 'That statistic makes my hair stand on end.'

Read the full article at Visma-Lease a Bike Vows to Repay Monument Debt after Worst Return of Entire WorldTour in 2024 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
